summary: A reformed pusher is sure God has a plan for him in returning to his old neighborhood - to redeem a friend, he thinks - but God's plan is apparently greater.
cast: Stephen Schmaltz|Catrina Fagundes|Peter Wayne Burke|Charles Upshaw|Kent Burrell|Rachel Greninger|Ty Mays|Laura Grieve|Susanna Fuller|Robert Lee|Lincoln Dyre|Billy Mobley|Doug Fagundes|Billy Cheung|Jessica Corey|Sydney Polette|Mary Beth Aramburu|Kenny Hembree|Charles Misner|David Grenninger|Kenny Smith|Adrian Aramburu|Dave Giller|Korin Sandelin|Mark Cotton|Aaron Williams|Jen Cady|Elexis Archie|Basia Bossinas|Antonio Aramburu|James Genest|Jeffrey Young|Jeff Warner|Kevin Reinsch|Mario Medina|Erik Allen|Courtney Allen|Zachary Misner|Ashley Rose Misner|Marco Molina|Chris Watkins|Richard Reidt|Jennifer Corey|Chantha Misner
title: Hollow
